thread.section_title: Starhotels Metropole - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short break away
thread.title_full: Short break away - Review of Starhotels Metropole, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Chloe L
title: Short break away
text:
We visited this hotel a couple of weeks ago and could not fault anything. Location is great once you have your bearings nothing is to far and the hop on hop bus stop is a few mins walk away, breakfast here was good to plenty of choice.
There's plenty of restraunts near by which are reasonable to.
Rooms were lovely and cleaned everyday
Staff were so helpful and made a pleasant stay,nothing was to much and very helpful spoke good English, we booked a taxi and it was there within 4 mins and not expensive either about 5 euros to get to the collousum you can walk this in 20-30 to
Defiantly will return to this hotel and reccomend it to anyone :)
